name: Fighter War Shooting Helicopter
description:
Complete the attack and dangerous missions, be a super fighter in the world war.
Advanced Mobile Aircraft Fighter Flight Simulator.
Fighter War is an amazing game with 3D graphics, that mixes arcade style with characteristics of combat flight simulation.
With your super fighter, you will involved in ground attack missions and dangerous landing operations.
Escape the prison camp and blast your way through enemy lines. Will you succeed to destroy them and finally make an end to World War?
Disengage your jet from enemy SAM missiles, avoid radars, select your favorite weapons and destroy warships, shoot choppers and try always-new free scenarios from online community with free flight mode.

Features:
- World War II style fighter
- Different missions to select.
- Worldwide scenario access
- Comprehensive Tutorials - Free flight mode
- A variety of weapons to achieve
